    • getAccessLatency

      public double getAccessLatency(UserRequest userRequest, Datacenter datacenter)
      Description copied from interface: NetworkTopology
      Get the access latency between the user request and the data center. The access latency is calculated based on the area where the user belongs and the region where the data center belongs.
      Specified by:
      getAccessLatency in interface NetworkTopology
      Parameters:
      userRequest - the user request.
      datacenter - the data center.
      Returns:
      the access latency between the user request and the data center.
